data.title: de Montfort
data.text:
De Montfort-l’Amaury

Amaury de Montfort-l’Amaury fl 1022/52; m.Bertrade, dau of Guillaume de Gommetz

1a) Simon, Sire de Montfort, d.ca 1087; m.1st Isabeau de Broyes, Dame de Nogent-le-Roi, dau of Hugues Bardoul; m.2nd NN; m.3rd Agnès, dau of Richard, Cte d’Evreux

[by 1st m.]:

1b) Amaury (1056-k.a.ca 1089)

2b) Isabeau, Dame de Nogent-le-Roi; m.Raoul de Toeny, Sire de Conches (d.24 Mar 1102)

3b) Guillaume, 1095 Bp of Paris, d.27 Aug 1102

[by 3rd m.]:

4b) Richard, k.a.ca 1092

5b) Simon, d.after 1104

6b) Amaury, 1118 Cte d’Evreux, Sire de Montfort, d.after 1136; m.1st (div 1118) Richilde, dau of Baldwin, Ct of Hainault; m.2nd by 1127 Agnès, dau of Anceau de Garlande, Cte de Rochefort (and later wife of Robert of France, Cte d’Evreux)

[by 1st or 2nd m.]:

1c) Amaury, Cte d’Evreux, Sire de Montfort, d.1140

[by 2nd m.]:

2c) Simon, Cte d’Evreux et de Rochefort, Sire de Montfort, d.1181; m.Mahaut N

1d) Amaury, Cte d’Evreux, d.13 Mar 1182; m.ca 1170 Mabel (d.1188), dau of William FitzRobert, Earl of Gloucester

1e) Amaury, Cte d’Evreux, Earl of Gloucester, d.by Nov 1213; m.1st by 1198 Agnes, dau of Hugues d’Amboise; m.2nd by 1203 Melisende, dau of Hugh de Gurnay (and later wife of Guillaume de Canteloup)

2d) Simon, 1199 Cte de Montfort, , Cte de Rochefort, d.by 1188; m.by 1175 Amicie (d.3 Sep 1215), dau of Robert de Beaumont, Earl of Leicester (and later wife of Guillaume des Barres)

1e) Simon, Earl of Leicester, Vcte de Béziers et de Carcassone, Duc de narbonne, Cte de Toulouse, leader of the Crusade against the Albigensians, k.a.Toulouse 25 Jun 1218; m.ca 1190 Alix (d.24 Feb 1221), dau of Boucard de Montmorency

1f) Amaury, Cte de Montfort, 1218-23 Duc de Narbonne, Cte de Toulouse, et Vcte de Béziers et de Carcassone, d.Otranto 1241; m.Béatrix (d.17 Sep 1248), dau of Guigues, Dauphin de Viennois; King Henry III of England refused to allow him the Leicester estates and title, which the King subsequently allowed to Amaury’s younger brother

1g) Jean, Cte de Montfort, d.Cyprus 1249; m.Jeanne, dau of Vcte Geoffroy de Châteaudun (and later wife of Jean de Brienne)

1h) Béatrix, Cts de Montfort, d.9 Mar 1311; m.1260 Robert, Cte de Dreux (d.1282)

2g) Marguerite; m.Jean, Cte de Soissons

3g) Laure; m.1st Fernando of Castile, Cte d’Aumale; m.2nd Henri de Grandpré

4g) Adèle, d.28 Mar 1279; m.1242 Simon de Clermont (d.1286)

5g) Peronnelle, Abbess of Port-Royal, d.5 Dec 1275

2f) Guy, k.a.Castelnaudary 1220; m.Tarbes 6 Nov 1216 Pétronille, Cts de Bigorre, Vcts de Marsan, dau of Bernard, Cte de Comminges, and widow of Gaston de Moncada, Vcte de Béarn, and divorced wife of Nuno Sánchez of Aragón, Cde de Rosellón (and later wife of Aimar de Rançon and of Boson de Mastes)

1g) Alix, Cts de Bigoore, d.1255; m.1st Jourdain Eschivat de Chabanais; m.2nd Raoul de Courtenay, Cte di Chieti (d.Naples 1271)

2g) Perronelle; m.Raoul de la Roche-Tesson

3f) Simon, Earl of Leicester (1208/9-k.a.Evesham 4 Aug 1265), the great leader of the Barons against King Henry III; m.Westminster 7 Jan 1238 Eleonor (1215-13 Apr 1275), dau of King John of England, and widow of William Marshall, Earl of Pembroke

1g) Henry, k.a.Evesham 4 Aug 1265

2g) Peter fl 1259

3g) Simon, d.Siena 1271; in 1270 he and his brother guy murdered Henry of Almayne, son of their uncle Richard, Earl of Cornwall, German King

4g) Guy, Cte di Nola, d.1288; m.Margherita, dau of Cte Aldobrandin Aldobrandeschi (and later wife of Orsello Orsini)

1h) Anastasia, Ctsa di Nola; m.8 Jun 1293 Raimondo Orsini

2h) Thomasse; m.Pietro Vico

5g) Amaury, d.after Feb 1301; said by some to have had issue

6g) Richard, d.after 1265

7g) Eleonore (ca 1252-1282); m.1278 Llewellyn, Pr of Wales

4f) Robert

5f) Perronnelle

6f) Amicie, d.20 Feb 1253; m.Gaucher de Joigny, sn de Châteaurenard

7f) Laure; m.Gérard de Picquigny, vidame d’Amiens

2e) Guy, sn de la Ferté-Alais,k.a.Vareilles 31 Jan 1228; m.1st Helvide, dau of Balian d’Ibelin, and widow of Renaud of Sidon, Pr of Sagette; m.2nd Briende, dau of Lambert de Monteil, and widow of Lambert de Thury

1f) [ex 1] Philippe, lord of Tyrus, 1248 Pretender to Armenia, murdered 17 Mar 1270; m.1st Eleonore, dau of Pierre de Courtenay, Emperor of Constantinople; m.2nd Marie, heiress of Toron, dau of Raymond Rupen, Pr of Antioch

[by 1st m.]:

1g) Philippe, d.Tunis 24 Sep 1270; m.Jeanne (d.1284), dau of Gui de Lévis

[by 2nd m.]:

2g) Jean, lord of Toron and Tyrus, Cte di Squillache, d.27 Nov 1289; m.1268 Marguerite, titular Pss of Antioch (d.30 Jan 1308), dau of Philippe of Antioch, King of Armenia

1h) Jean, Cte di Squillache e Montescaglioso, Captain General of Calabria; m.1st Isabella, dau of Manfredo Malatesta; m.2nd Giovanna di Fasanella; m.3rd Marguerite (d.1307), dau of Pierre de Beaumont (and later wife of Robert de Dreux, Cte di Squillache)

2h) Laure; m.Bernard, Cte de Commnges

3h) Eleonore; m.Jean, Cte de Vendôme

4h) Jeanne; m.1st 1268 Guy d’Albon, Cte de Forez (d.1278); m.2nd Louis of Savoy, Baron de Vaud

3g) Honfroy, lord of Tyrus, d.12 Feb 1284; m.Eschiva, lady of Beirut (d.1312), dau of Jean d’Ibelin, lord of Bairut (and later wife of Guy of Cyprus)

1h) Amaury, d.28 Dec 1304

2h) Rupen, lord of Toron, d.1313; m.Maria, dau of Balian d’Ibelin

1i) Honfroy, Constable of Cyprus (1305-1326)

1j) Eschiva; m.1342 Peter I, King of Cyprus and Armenia (d.1369)

2j) Alix

2i) Jeannette; m.Balian d’Ibelin

3h) Alix

4h) Helvis

4g) Philippe, d.1282; m.Guillaume d’Esneval

5g) Alix

6g) Helvis

2f) Pernelle

3f) Alicie

4f) Agnès

5f) Guidon, d.on Crusade

3e) Peronelle, d.3 Feb 1216; m.Barthélémy de Roye (d.1237)

3d) Bertrade (1155-1227); m.1169 Hugh, Earl of Chester, Vcte d’Avranches (d.30 Jun 1181)

3c) Agnès, d.15 Dec 1181; m.Galeran de Beaumont, Cte de Meulan, Earl of Worcester (d.1166)

7b) Bertrade, d.Fontevrault 14 Feb 1117; m.1st (div) Foulcques, Cte d’Anjou (d.1109); m.2nd 15 May 1092 (repudiated 1104) Philippe I, King of France (d.30 Jul 1108)
